column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I've longed to visit this museum for years
column2: and the Magritte provided the perfect prompt. We were greeted by the amazing architecture (not to mention the lions) and helpful staff. This just set the perfect tone for a day of Magritte
column3: everyone's favorite surrealist. The exhibit is truly mind-bendingly wonderful (and mind-bending in general). We all enjoyed the exhibit and the others moving through at the same time seemed to be just as gripped as we were.
